data.sentence: The word هُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: to wonder, menstruate, rejoice, inspire with awe, ridicule, laugh at, laugh, become clear.
data.sentence: The word أَضْحَكَ comes from the root ض ح ك and is associated with the meanings: to wonder, menstruate, rejoice, inspire with awe, ridicule, laugh at, laugh, become clear.

data.meanings: wept, lamented/grieved, shed tears, crying, cause to weep, rain, unable to speak.
data.sentence: The word وَأَبْكَى comes from the root ب ك ي and is associated with the meanings: wept, lamented/grieved, shed tears, crying, cause to weep, rain, unable to speak.
